channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Enough with the Gaza Famine Canard
item.description: Food insecurity in Gaza is being exaggerated, and few observing the real suffering there blame Hamas.

item.title: Winning Big Looks Like Texas Passing A Bathroom Bill With Zero Corporate Shakedowns
item.description: With barely a whisper of corporate or public backlash, Texas' bathroom bill marks a seismic shift in American opinion on trans issues.

item.title: Outgoing Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers Is Going Out With A Leftist Bang
item.description: After two terms as the vessel of the far left, Evers is leaving. And he has nothing to lose. Certainly not his dignity or integrity.

item.title: Twinless Turns Love Inside Out
item.description: A heart-wrenching follow-up to James Sweeney’s stellar debut.

item.title: Weary managers of the world, get ready to learn a new skill: Leading all the AI agents and bots whose work you’ll be accountable for
item.description: The era when “team leadership” meant only humans is over. The savviest workers are now using multiple AI models.

item.description: The Chinese crypto tycoon, who is one of the project’s biggest backers, appears to have been blacklisted.

item.title: GOP rising star reveals how Trump's agenda will be crucial to keeping Senate seat red, lands key endorsements
item.description: Republican Rep. Ashley Hinson tells Fox News Digital she's 'proud to stand' with President Trump as she runs to keep Iowa's open Senate seat red

item.title: Trump will seek 'Department of War' rebrand for Pentagon
item.description: President Trump will rename the Department of Defense to the Department of War through executive action, a move he's been hinting at for weeks.

item.title: Monica Lewinsky Made Her Own Choices And Shouldn’t Exploit Real Victims
item.description: No matter how often Lewinsky reinvents herself, her constant, obvious attempts to recast herself in the role of victim are an affront to real victims.

item.title: California overbilled Medicaid $500 million to provide care for undocumented immigrants — and now Trump is cracking down
item.description: It’s not clear whether that money has been repaid.

item.title: The Right Way to Go After Venezuelan Drug Traffickers
item.description: If Trump believes that Venezuela is attacking the U.S. via a narco-terrorist proxy, he should ask Congress to authorize the use of military force.

item.title: How Can the White House, Congress, and Others Repair Damaged Trust in Official Statistics?
item.description: Without independence from political control, official statistics lack credibility and value.
